SourceProxy.name: NSmoothFilter
SourceProxy.label: NSmoothFilter

Documentation.long_help: Find smoothed variable value by averaging over N nearest neighbors (default 50). For those variables which need a volume to be computed (e.g. density) consider the volume as sphere around point with radius of the outermost neighbor point.

SourceProxy.Documentation: More documentation can be listed here

IntVectorProperty.name: NeighborNumber
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Sets the neighbor number to smooth over (default value is 50).
